title: The Book of Ash
description: A satire of feel-good therapy set in a post-apocalyptic dystopia where the peddlers of self-esteem often mask raging insecurities and homicidal urges. What more could you ask for?Struggling to survive amidst the chaos is Baldwin Wallace, a 33-year-old miracle counselor whose marriage is crumbling under the weight of his wife's infidelity. When Baldwin finally decides to confront the issue once and for all, he is thrown into a dizzying swirl of events that not only threatens to change the future of his surreal world, but also bring him the one thing he thought he could live without: love. Aww.
author: John A. McCaffrey
